title: Bug 9457A fatal error happened while informing the user about a fatal error.
description: Bug 9457A fatal error happened while informing the user about a fatal error. I had to kill the workbench.
SR: Build 20020205While performing a build, I got a NullPointerException in the junit plugin.This opened an error dialog, but this caused another NPE, and another errordialog to be opened, etc.
